Smoking fish is a long enduring tradition of curing fish, besides enhancing their flavour in various wood smokes like hickory, mesquite, cherry, apple company company, etc. Smoking fish is an obviously better way of preservation involving fish, as compared to help refrigeration, which not only changes the texture from the fish, but also ruins the particular inherent taste and flavour belonging to the fish.

Methods of tobacco fish

There are two methods for smoking fish; the traditional as well as mechanical way. The conventional way, is the old school procedure for keeping the fish immediately, suspended over smouldering fire wood and wood shavings, which helps infuse the smoky flavours from the wood, slowly into the flesh with the fish.
